What is Turbo Stunt Racing?

Turbo Stunt Racing is a high-octane 3D racing game where you perform daring stunts, avoid traps, and compete against opponents on action-packed tracks. Unlock cars and upgrades to enhance performance and style.

How to Play Turbo Stunt Racing?

  • Steer Your Car: Navigate tracks using precise controls.
  • Perform Stunts: Jump ramps, spin flips, and hit tricks for bonus points.
  • Race Rivals: Outspeed AI opponents or multiplayer rivals.
  • Upgrade Vehicles: Enhance speed, handling, and stunt potential.
  • Complete Levels: Master each track to unlock new challenges.
